alert.note: Alert for Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 22 at 10:56AM EDT until September 23 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. Waves 7 to 10 feet. * WHERE...In Indiana, Northern La Porte county. In Michigan, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien counties. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
